trans-unit.source: Specifies the internal execution behavior of a durable service contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: 指定長期服務合約實作的內部執行行為。

trans-unit.source: The following items are checked as part of the validation logic for durable services:
trans-unit.target: 會檢查以下項目，做為長期服務驗證邏輯的一部分︰

trans-unit.source: All sessionful bindings have a context binding element such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 所有工作階段式繫結都有一個內容繫結項目，如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> value must not be set to Multiple.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> 值不可設為 Multiple。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> value must be PerSession.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> 值必須是 PerSession。

trans-unit.source: There must be one sessionful endpoint configured for the service.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定一個供服務使用的工作階段式端點。

trans-unit.source: If the contract disallows sessions, then <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A> must be set to `true` for all operations.
trans-unit.target: 若合約不允許工作階段，則所有作業的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A> 必須設為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: If the contract permits or allows sessions then all operations for which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A> is set to `true` must be request/response operations, that is <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A> cannot be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若合約允許工作階段，則所有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A> 設為 `true` 的作業必須是要求/回應作業，也就是 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A> 不能設為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> is set to `true`, then all operations on the service must either be marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to `true` or marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption.Mandatory?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> 設為 `true`，則服務上的所有作業必須標示已設為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的 `true`，或標示 <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption.Mandatory?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> must be set to Single.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> 必須設為 Single

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 未實作。

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 未實作在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Customizes the service runtime to support durable service behavior properties, such as specifying a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider" /> for the service.
trans-unit.target: 自訂服務執行階段，以支援長期服務行為屬性，如指定服務的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service instance state is persisted to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider" /> using the same transaction under which the operation is run.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，此值表示是否會採用與執行作業相同的交易，將服務執行個體的狀態保存至 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service instance state is persisted using the same transaction; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若服務執行個體的狀態會使用相同交易保存，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> is set to `true`, then all operations on the service must either be marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to `true` or marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption.Mandatory?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> 設為 `true`，則服務上的所有作業必須標示已設為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 的 `true`，或標示 <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption.Mandatory?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> must be set to Single.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> 必須設為 Single

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> to `true` makes the service state transactional with the operation transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> 設為 `true`，會使服務狀態與作業交易一同交易化。

trans-unit.source: This means that if the operation's transaction rolls back, the service state also rolls back.
trans-unit.target: 這表示若作業的異動復原，則服務狀態也會復原。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction" /> enumeration value associated with the durable service.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與長期服務相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute> is instantiated, it sets this property value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction.TerminateInstance>.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute> 具現化時，會將此屬性值設為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction.TerminateInstance>。

trans-unit.source: This means that whenever an unknown exception is encountered by the durable service, the service instance is terminated and any state information is deleted from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 這表示當長期服務遇到未知例外狀況時，便會終止服務執行個體，且所有狀態資訊會從持續性存放區中刪除。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that all durable operations on the service are set up correctly.
trans-unit.target: 驗證服務上的所有長期作業是否都正確設定。
